Public NotInheritable Class CodeDomLocalizationProvider Implements IDesignerSerializationProvider, IDisposable
public ref class CodeDomLocalizationProvider sealed : IDisposable, System::ComponentModel::Design::Serialization::IDesignerSerializationProvider
type CodeDomLocalizationProvider = class interface IDisposable interface IDesignerSerializationProvider

summary.span: 提供 CodeDOM 资源序列化服务。

span.span: Provides CodeDOM resource serialization services.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是序列化提供程序提供了本地化功能。The class is a serialization provider that provides a localization feature. 它支持序列化到资源通过，并且它将两个属性添加到的根组件：`Language`和`Localizable`。It supports serializing to resources through , and it adds two properties to the root component: `Language` and `Localizable`. 如果`Localizable`设置为`true`，此提供程序更改组件属性生成，并将其值路由到的资源文件的方式。If `Localizable` is set to `true`, this provider changes the way that component properties are generated and routes their values to a resource file. 支持两种本地化模型。Two localization models are supported. 您可以控制提供的区域性和本地化的构造函数参数的样式。You can control the cultures that are offered and the style of localization with constructor parameters.

related.span: 动态源代码生成和编译

span.span: Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数创建一个新的适配器，并将其附加到序列化管理器。The constructor creates a new adapter and attaches it to the serialization manager. 这将自身添加为资源的序列化程序到序列化管理器，以及如果添加尚不存在，将自身添加为扩展程序提供程序的根组件到。This adds itself as a serializer for resources into the serialization manager, and, if not already added, adds itself as an extender provider to the root component. 如果`model`参数不是，则提供`Language`和`Localizable`属性。If the `model` parameter is not , the provides the `Language` and `Localizable` properties.

related.span: 动态源代码生成和编译

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数创建一个新的适配器，并将其附加到序列化管理器。The constructor creates a new adapter and attaches it to the serialization manager. 这将自身添加为资源的序列化程序到序列化管理器，以及如果添加尚不存在，将自身添加为扩展程序提供程序的根组件到。This adds itself as a serializer for resources into the serialization manager, and, if not already added, adds itself as an extender provider to the root component. 如果`model`参数不是，则提供`Language`和`Localizable`属性。If the `model` parameter is not , the provides the `Language` and `Localizable` properties. 如果`supportedCultures`未提供默认值是当前安装在计算机的所有区域性。If `supportedCultures` is not provided, the default is all cultures that are currently installed on the computer. 如果提供的区域性数组，并且它包括计算机未安装的区域性，则这些区域性不可用。If an array of cultures is provided, and it includes cultures that are not installed on the computer, those cultures are not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
